Curious explorations There is a story there, I think.

How I get lost in street art - the begining.

Share this:

15 Oct 2017

This shook me. "Jesus makes beautiful things out of dust" #travel #murals #streets #nepal

A post shared by Rishi Gaurav Bhatnagar (@rishigb) on Sep 24, 2016 at 6:45pm PDT

Some stories just stay with you.

The begining

It was the year 2011. I was close to completing 1 year in Bangalore. This was the first time I was going to visit Brigade road. I found something very intersting drawn on the wall, and I couldnâ€™t take my eyes off of it. So when I visited the same road again, now equipped with a good camera phone, the first thing I did was to capture it and the second thing - geo tag it.

A post shared by Rishi Gaurav Bhatnagar (@rishigb) on Sep 15, 2015 at 1:21am PDT

I started noticing the same mural but in different sizes across various locations within Banglaore, and then, in Delhi, and then, in Kolkata and then in Mumbai.

That is where I knew, this seemingly simple piece of art has a very strong story behind it. So I found myself on a quest to passively start searching for the origin story.
